proficiencyLevels.Foundational: Delivers well-scoped tasks with mentorship and code reviews, follows standards/runbooks, and supports incremental fixes and maintenance.
proficiencyLevels.Proficient: Plans and ships features end-to-end, makes informed trade-offs, writes testable/maintainable code, and communicates risks and timelines clearly.
proficiencyLevels.Advanced: Leads the design of services or subsystems, drives performance/reliability/security improvements, mentors teammates, and elevates engineering practices.
proficiencyLevels.Expert: Sets technical direction and standards, leads complex multi-team initiatives, manages ambiguity and risk, and delivers long-term architectural outcomes.

soft.description: Clear written and verbal communication; keeps teams aligned

soft.name: Adaptability and resilience

soft.name: Drive and energy

soft.description: Guides teams and supports knowledge transfer
soft.name: Leadership & Mentoring
